attributes.action: Introduce a national tree-planting scheme to offset carbon emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To offset the effects of carbon emissions on global warming.
Introduce a national tree-planting scheme on all available spare land, parks, open spaces and along motorway verges where trees would not hamper visibility, 
Introduce an automatic preservation order for trees over a certain size and age. 
Give mature trees enhanced protection from planning development

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
